agenda: Reviewing the design of the check trigger for role-based attribute validation
Identifying action items and assigning tasks to team members
summary: Defining role-based attributes for Route objects using MQL
Creating a DomainObject API for the Route object to capture these attributes
Designing and implementing the OOTB policy trigger to enforce checks
Testing the check trigger's performance impact on the system
Conducting functional and regression testing to ensure API stability

action_items.summary: Define role-based attributes for Route objects using MQL
action_items.description: Create MQL script to define required role-based attributes for Route objects

action_items.summary: Create DomainObject API for the Route object
action_items.description: Design and implement the API to capture role-based attributes

action_items.summary: Design and implement the OOTB policy trigger
action_items.description: Create and configure the policy trigger to enforce attribute checks

action_items.summary: Test performance impact on the system
action_items.description: Perform load testing and optimize queries to minimize impact

action_items.summary: Functional testing of the check trigger

action_items.description: Test for any unexpected behavior or regressions
